questionDesc:
When an array is passed to a method, what does the method receive?
a) The reference of the array
b) A copy of the array
c) Length of the array
d) Copy of first element

Which of the follwing below live on the heap in java?
a) Class
b) Instance variable
c) Method
d) Object

Which of these interface handle sequences?
a) Set
b) List
c) Comparator
d) Collection

Which is correct about an instance variable of type String?
a) It defaults to an empty string.
b) It defaults to null.
c) It does not have a default value.
d) None

#include is called?
a) Preprocessor directive
b) Inclusion directive
c) File inclusion directive
d) None

Property which allows to produce different executable for different platforms in C is called?
a) File inclusion
b) Selective inclusion
c) Conditional compilation
d) Recursive macros

typedef which of the following may create problem in the program?
a) ;
b) printf/scanf
c) Arithmetic operators
d) All of the mentioned

Which keyword can be used for coming out of recursion?
a) break
b) return
c) exit
d) Both (a) and (b)

The keyword 'break' cannot be simply used within:
a) do-while
b) if-else
c) for
d) while

Which keyword is used to come out of a loop only for that iteration?
a) break
b) continue
c) return
d) None of the mentioned

For tuples and list which is correct?
a) List and tuples both are mutable.
b) List is mutable whereas tuples are immutable.
c) List and tuples both are immutable.
d) List is immutable whereas tuples are mutable.

What command is used to shuffle a list ‘L’?
a) L.shuffle()
b) random.shufflelist(L)
c) shuffle(L)
d) random.Shuffle(L)

What is the maximum length of the filename in DOS?
a) 4
b) 5
c) 8
d) 12

What else is a command interpreter called?
a) prompt
b) kernel
c) shell
d) command

Banker's algorithm is used??
a) To prevent deadlock
b) To deadlock recovery
c) To solve the deadlock
d) None of these

Where are placed the list of processes that are prepared to be executed and waiting?
a) Job queue
b) Ready queue
c) Execution queue
d) Process queue

Which of the following is a type of polymorphism in Java?
a) Execution time polymorphism
b) Compile time polymorphism
c) Multiple polymorphism
d) Multilevel polymorphism

We cannot create instance of_____?
a) Abstract
b) Inheritance
c) Encapsulation
d) Class

Default member in a class?
a) Public
b) Private
c) Protected
d) Static

Which statement about a valid .java file is true?
a. It can only contain one class declaration.
b. It can contain one pulic class declaration and one public interface definition.
c. It must define at least one public class.
d. It may define at most one public class.
